snippet: Ray Cappo: Heavy metal rocker of the ’80s, former celibate monk, who specializes in gravity-defying yoga poses.
abstract: Ray Cappo: Heavy metal rocker of the ’80s, former celibate monk, who specializes in gravity-defying yoga poses.
lead_paragraph: “The packed crowd celebrating the 25th anniversary of Revelation Records at Irving Plaza in Manhattan on an October night was predominately pierced, tattooed and male,” Mary Billard wrote in The New  York Times, of the event where Ray Cappo, 46, one of the label’s founders, was performing.

headline.main: Heavy Metal Rocker Now Lifts Spirits as the Yogi Raghunath
